name: Getting Through It All By Yourself
name_original: Getting Through It All By Yourself
description:
GETTING THROUGH IT ALL BY YOURSELF! A game about getting through life all in one go. Influenced by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy.

Game a Week #5

Fifth game as part of RMIT's Game A Week, the theme for this week was "Physics".

Wanted to do some narration for this but ran out of time unfortunately, just pretend I'm talking about getting through tough places in life :)
